terminologie_extrait.definition: the act of serving the ball in table tennis
terminologie_extrait.contexte: when discussing a pre-serve routine and visualizing the serve

debutant.description: Finalize what serve you will do and then clear your mind to prepare for the upcoming rally.

exercices_complementaires.description: Push up the sleeve of your serving shoulder, drop your serving arm so it hangs loosely, and then swing it back and forth one time like a pendulum.

metriques_progression.location_of_contact: Low or high, depending on the serve
metriques_progression.flight_of_the_ball: Curving, sinking, floating, or flat, depending on the spin and speed of the serve

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Not visualizing all aspects of the serve
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Not mentally preparing for the follow-up after serving.
